Verses: 1 neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Pillaigal; Seththavanukkaagak Keerik Kollaamalum, Ungal Kangalukku Idaiyile Savarampannaamalum Iruppeergalaaga.
2 neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Parisuththamaana Janangal; Boomiyinmeedhengumulla Ellaa Janangalilum Ungalaiye Karththar Thamakkuch Sondha Janangalaayirukkath Therindhukondaar.
3 aruvaruppaanadhondraiyum Pusikkavendaam.
4 neengal Pusikkaththagum Mirugangalaavana: Maatum, Semmariyaadum, Vellaadum,
5 maanum, Velimaanum, Kalaimaanum, Varaiyaadum, Pullimaanum, Sarukumaanum, Pulvaayume.
6 mirugangalil Virikulampulladhaayirundhu, Kulampugal Irandaagap Pirindhirukkiradhum, Asaipodugiradhumaana Sagala Mirugangalaiyum Neengal Pusikkalaam;

7 asaipodugiravaigalilum, Virikulampullavaigalilum, Neengal Pusikkaththakaadhavaigal Evaiyendraal: Ottagamum, Musalum, Kuzhimusalume; Avaigal Asaipottum Avaigalukku Virikulampillai; Avaigal Ungalukku Asuththamaayiruppadhaaga.

8 pandriyum Pusikkaththakaadhu; Adhu Virikulampulladhaayirundhum, Asaipodaadhirukkum; Adhu Ungalukku Asuththamaayiruppadhaaga; Ivaigalin Maamsaththaip Pusiyaamalum Ivaigalin Udalaith Thodaamalum Iruppeergalaaga.
9 jalaththilirukkira Ellaavatrilum Siragum Sedhilum Ullavaigalaiyellaam Neengal Pusikkalaam.
10 siragum Sedhilum Illaadha Yaadhondraiyum Pusikkalaagaadhu; Adhu Ungalukku Asuththamaayiruppadhaaga.
11 suththamaana Sagala Patchigalaiyum Neengal Pusikkalaam.
12 neengal Pusikkaththagaadhavaigal Evaiyendraal: Kazhugum, Karudanum, Kadaluraanjiyum,
13 pairiyum, Valloorum, Sagalavidha Parundhum,
14 sagalavidha Kaagangalum,
15 theekkuruviyum, Kookaiyum, Sempukamum, Sagalavidhamaana Tegaiyum,
16 aandhaiyum, Kottaanum, Naaraiyum,
17 koozhakkataavum, Kurukum, Neerkkaakamum,
18 kokkum, Sagalavidha Raajaaliyum, Puzhukkoththiyum, Vowvaalume.
19 parakkiravaigalil Oorvana Yaavum Ungalukku Asuththaamaayiruppadhaaga; Avaigal Pusikkaththagaadhavaigal.
20 suththamaana Paravaigal Yaavaiyum Neengal Pusikkalaam.

21 thaanaai Irandhuponadhondraiyum Pusikkavendaam; Ungal Vaasalgalil Irukkira Paradhesikku Adhaip Pusikkak Kodukkalaam; Alladhu Anniyanukku Adhai Vitruppodalaam; Neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Parisuththa Janangal. Vellaattukkuttiyai Adhin Thaayin Paalile Samaikkavendaam.
22 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Eppozhudhum Bayandhirukkap Pazhagumbadikku, Varushandhorum Nee Vidhaikkira Vidhaippinaale Vayalil Vilaiyum Ellaap Palanilum Thasamabaagaththaip Piriththu,

23 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thamadhu Naamam Vilangumbadi Therindhukollum Sthaanaththile, Un Dhaaniyaththilum Un Thiraatcharasaththilum Un Enneyilum Thasamabaagaththaiyum Un Aadumaadugalin Thalaiyeetrugalaiyum Avarudaiya Sannidhiyil Pusippaayaaga.

24 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Aaseervadhikkum Kaalaththil, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thamadhu Naamam Vilangumbadi Therindhukonda Sthaanam Unakku Vegu Dhooramaayirukkiradhinaal, Vazhippirayaanaththin Vegu Tholaiyinimiththam, Nee Adhaik Kondupogak Koodaadhirukkumaanaal,
25 adhaip Panamaakki, Panamudippai Un Kaiyile Pidiththukkondu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Therindhukonda Sthalaththirkup Poi,

26 ange Un Ishtappadi Aadumaadu, Thiraatcharasam, Madhubaanam Mudhalaana Sagalaththaiyum Panamkoduththu Vaangi, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil, Neeyum Un Kudumbaththaarum Un Vaasalgalil Irukkira Leviyanum Pusiththuch Sandhoshappaduveergalaaga.
27 leviyanukku Unnode Pangum Sudhandharamum Illaadhabadiyaal Avanaik Kaividaayaaga.
28 moondraam Varushaththin Mudivile Avvarushaththil Unakku Vandha Balan Ellaavatrilum Thasamabaagaththaip Piriththu, Un Vaasalgalil Vaikkakkadavaai.

29 leviyanukku Unnode Pangum Sudhandharamum Illaadhabadiyinaal, Avanum, Un Vaasalgalil Irukkira Paradhesiyum, Thikkatravanum. Vidhavaiyum Vandhu Pusiththuth Thirupthiyadaivaargalaaga; Appozhudhu Un Kai Seyyum Velaiyilellaam Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Aaseervadhippaar.
